div.p: The PaymentReconciliation resource provides the bulk payment details associated with a payment by the payor for goods and services rendered by a provider to patients covered by insurance plans offered by that payor. These are the payment reconciliation details which align to the individual payment amounts indicated on discrete ClaimResponses.

Bulk payments need to provide a means to associate the amounts paid again specific Claims, and other financial exchanges and adjustments, to the bulk payment itself in order to reconcile provider accounts receivable.
